p: The chemical composition of the cardamom oil was analyzed by GC–MS/FID. The identity of main constituents was confirmed by their mass fragmentation analysis. The main compounds in oil identified were: Terpinyl acetate, 1,8 Cineole, α-terpineol, linalool, followed by lower quantities of trans-geraniol, L-4 - terpineol, D-limonene, linalyl anthranilate, β-pinene ( Table 1).
